mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTIFICATION(NOTI_ID, PROJ_NAME,NOTIFICATION.MEM_ID, NOTI_CONTENT, NOTI_NOTIFIDED ,NOTI_REGDATE) SELECT SCHE_ID, 'privacy', s.MEM_ID , SCHE_CONTENT,'N',SCHE_END FROM SCHEDULE s WHERE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SCHE_END, 'mm/dd/yyyy'), 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+1,'YYYYMMDD')

SELECT CONCAT(MEM_ID, WBS_ID), p.PROJ_NAME, p.MEM_ID, WBS_NAME, 'N', TO_DATE(WBS_END_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') FROM PROJMEMLIST p , PROJECT p2 , DOCUMENT d , TOPCATEGORY t , FBS f ,WBS w WHERE p.PROJ_NAME =p2.PROJ_NAME AND p2.PROJ_NAME = d.PROJ_NAME AND d.DOC_ID = t.DOC_ID AND t.TOP_ID = f.TOP_ID AND f.MID_ID = w.MID_ID AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(WBS_END_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+1,'yyyy-mm-dd');
mapper.select: SELECT NOTI_ID, PROJ_NAME, MEM_ID , NOTI_CONTENT , NOTI_NOTIFIDED, NOTI_REGDATE FROM NOTIFICATION n WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId} ORDER BY NOTI_REGDATE
SELECT PROJ_NAME, MEM_ID , NOTI_CONTENT , NOTI_NOTIFIDED, NOTI_REGDATE FROM NOTIFICATION n WHERE NOTI_NOTIFIDED = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTIFICATION SET NOTI_NOTIFIDED = 'Y' WHERE NOTI_ID =#{notiId}
